sentence.text: Since excessive ingestion of vitamin A is known to induce spontaneous fractures and as the negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II-induced femur angulation in mice appears to be caused by intrauterine fractures, we analyzed bones from a xenobiotic metabolic process deficient human and rats with hypervitaminosis A to further explore Vegfa as a mechanistic link for the effect of vitamin A on bone.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
